insert-{question}--from-operation-browse.label: New question
insert-{question}--from-operation-browse.description: Select a question type and insert it.

operations.label: Open question
operations.description: An open question where the student answers a question by typing in an input field.

operations.label: Single choice
operations.description: A multiple-choice question where the student selects one answer option.

operations.label: Multiple choice
operations.description: A multiple-choice question where the student selects more than one answer option.

operations.label: True/false choice
operations.description: A true/false-choice question presents the learner with two choices, one correct, the other incorrect, often presented as true/false or yes/no responses.

operations.label: Sequencing question
operations.description: An interaction where the student puts items in the correct order.

operations.label: Matching question
operations.description: An interaction where the student matches each item to one other item.
